docs.snippet: Alarmed by the surge in Tommy John surgery, Major League Baseball and USA Baseball have set up a website that offers guidelines on pitching usage and injury prevention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alarmed by the surge in Tommy John surgery, Major League Baseball and USA Baseball have set up a website that offers guidelines on pitching usage and injury prevention.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that Major League Baseball and USA Baseball, alarmed by surge in Tommy John surgery, have set up a website that offers guidelines on pitching usage and injury prevention; pitchsmart.org is aimed at informing young athletes before they incur significant wear and tear.

headline.main: Pitching Website Aims to Protect Young Elbows
headline.print_headline: Pitching Website Aims to Protect Young Elbows

docs.snippet: The team has continued talks to bring back the free agent Chase Headley and has been exploring the trade market for an infielder who could take over the position Rodriguez has held for a decade....
docs.lead_paragraph: The team has continued talks to bring back the free agent Chase Headley and has been exploring the trade market for an infielder who could take over the position Rodriguez has held for a decade.
docs.abstract: MLB Roundup; New York Yankees are engaged in talks with free agent Chase Headley to return as their third baseman, and general manager Brian Cashman is also exploring trade market for same position; Alex Rodriguez stands to lose his job as starter at third if either option pans out; other baseball news noted.

headline.main: Alex Rodriguez May Be Out at Third as Yankees Pursue Other Options
headline.print_headline: With Yanks Pursuing Third Basemen, Rodriguez May Have to Take New Role

byline.original: By DAVID WALDSTEIN and TIM ROHAN
